game.title: Quest for the Ancient Amulet
game.objective: Find the Amulet and defeat the Dragon at Mount Eternity
game.description: Uncover the hidden treasure by solving riddles in the forest and facing the treacherous goblin tribe.
game.reward: Golden Amulet, 100 gold coins, and a rare magical potion
game.quest-giver: Old Sage at the Village Inn

task.objective: Deliver the enchanted scroll to the goblin chieftain
task.description: Follow the path marked by the tree with three leaves and avoid the traps
task.location: Goblin Camp, north of the forest boundary

task.objective: Retrieve the key from the chest in the cave
task.description: Climb to the top of Mount Eternity and find the hidden niche with the key
task.location: Cave entrance, near the base of the mountain
